name: Ludum Dare 51 - Automatos
description:
Ludum Dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds

FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED

Automatos is a shoot'em up inspired by 20 Minutes Till Dawn and Vampire Survivor.

You are a robot set in an arena where enemies spawn regularly, but your weapon only reloads every 10 seconds. 

Upgrades are available on every level up, powerful upgrades trigger once every 10 seconds!

Max Level: 15. (After that it's infinite spawns and no more upgrades)

Note

Had The DARK bundlen (https://itch.io/s/77771/the-dark-series-bundle) for a while and wanted to use it somewhere, this felt like the perfect situation!

Credits

Enemies, UI, Player character, Gun FX - The DARK - Penusbmic (https://penusbmic.itch.io/)

Spawn FX - Nyknck https://nyknck.itch.io/

Music - https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Various SFX - Shapeform Audios

Palette - https://lospec.com/palette-list/neon-rain

Controls UI - https://dreammix.itch.io/keyboard-keys-for-ui

Sword effect - https://anthonywinter.itch.io/crescent
